header.description: No header tokens defined for this report.

rows.description: Each row represents a gateway with its name, host, protocol, status, and timestamps.

totals.description: No totals defined for this report.

semantics: All columns are direct pass-through from the app_gateways table. No filtering or parameter-based selection is applied.
transformations: No reshaping required. All columns are sourced directly from app_gateways table.
